strapiJob.title: Office Manager
strapiJob.description:
The Office Manager will report to the Program Director and will serve as the office manager and first point of contact and connection for anyone who visits the Ozark Literacy Council offices. This role includes administrative and logistical office tasks but the ideal candidate will be someone who thrives on immediately connecting with people and building friendly and positive rapport in person, online and on the phone. The Office Manager will work Mondays - Thursdays 8:30 am - 3:00 pm for $15/hr.


To apply, send your cover letter and resume to Mina@ozarkliteracy.org
